channel.title: Mult-target ice barrage
channel.description: Someone gave me the code for multi-target ice barrage but it gave me 100 errors... if anyone has it please post the code and where to put it in.

item.title: Mult-target ice barrage
item.dc:creator: @snowycards snowycards
item.description:
@snowycards wrote:

let me try writing one for you???
declare this

[code]public void allInArea(int x, int y, int area, int damage) {
affectAll = allinTargetRange;
allinTargetRange = player.PlayerHandler[getPlayerID];
affectAll.playerTargetted = true;
affectAll.playerSurrounding = true;
affectAll = UpdateChar;
apply FinishingDMG;
}
}
}

if (spellID == 362) {
allInArea(Your coord X, Your coord Y, 3, 30);
applyDamage.all;
sendHpData;
}[/code]

Read full topic
